metadata.title: CVE-2017-9039 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: GNU Binutils 2.28 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service(memory consumption) via a crafted ELF file with many program headers,related to the get_program_headers function in readelf.c.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
